img_text: Tom Watson atom watson Brexit is stuck in the parliamentary pipework. The impasse works for neither Leavers or Remainers. I have come to the reluctant view that the only way to resolve this is for the country to have the final say Tomorrow I will jointhe #PutitToThePeople march. pic.twitter.com/78abwJzqHF 11:06 AMM- 22 Mar 2019 PUT IT TO THE PEOPLE PEOPLE'S VOTE MARCH
